  • *Old* *Pitched Battle (1,000)* (Chaos - Khorne) [980pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Uncategorised

      • Skull Altar

        Unit Abilities: Witchbane, Words of Hate


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Witchbane Subtract 1 from casting rolls for WIZARDS while they are within 16" of this model.
        Words of Hate You can re-roll prayer and judgement rolls for friendly KHORNE PRIESTS wholly within 8" of this model.

    • Leader [80pts]

      • Aspiring Deathbringer with Goreaxe and Skullhammer [80pts]

        Selections: General, Goreaxe & Skullhammer

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, ASPIRING DEATHBRINGER, Leader, General

        Command Abilities: Slaughter Incarnate, Unit: Aspiring Deathbringer, Unit Abilities: Bane of Cowards, Weapon: Goreaxe, Skullhammer


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Slaughter Incarnate You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHORNE MORTAL units while they are wholly within 12" of that model. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Aspiring Deathbringer 5"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bane of Cowards If an enemy unit fails a battleshock test within 3" of this model, add D3 to the number of models that flee.

    • Battleline [270pts]

      • Blood Warriors [100pts]

        Selections: 5 Blood Warriors [100pts], Goreaxe and Gorefist, Icon Bearer

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, BLOOD WARRIORS, Battleline

        Unit: Blood Warrior, Unit Abilities: Chaos Champion, Gorefists, Icon Bearers, No Respite, Weapon: Goreaxe


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Blood Warrior 5"264+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Chaos Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Goreaxe(s).
        Gorefists If an unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit that includes any models armed with a Goreaxe and Gorefist is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        No Respite If a model from this unit is slain in the combat phase, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack wtih all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Goreaxe Melee1"23+4+-1

        • Slaughterpriest [100pts]

          Selections: 2. Blood Sacrifice, Bloodbathed Axe

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, PRIEST, SLAUGHTERPRIEST, Leader

          Prayer: -, Blood Bind, Blood Boil, Blood Sacrifice, Unit: Slaughterpriest, Unit Abilities: Scorn of Sorcery, Weapon: Bloodbathed Axe

        • Slaughterpriest [100pts]

          Selections: 3. Resanguination, Hackblade & Wrath-hammer

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, PRIEST, SLAUGHTERPRIEST, Leader

          Prayer: -, Blood Bind, Blood Boil, Resanguination, Unit: Slaughterpriest, Unit Abilities: Scorn of Sorcery, Weapon: Hackblade, Wrath-hammer


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Banner of Rage You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly KHORNE units that are wholly within 12" of the bearer.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Widening the Rift Add 8" to the range of the Loathsome Sorcery and Rage of Khorne abilities used by this battalion's BLOODSECRATOR while it is wholly within 8" of any SLAUGHTERPRIESTS from the same battalion.
        Prayer Description Ref
        - In your hero phase, this model can chant one of the following prayers. If he does so, pick one of the prayers and then make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3 the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered.
        Blood Bind If this prayer is answered, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the model chanting this prayer and not within 3" of any friendly units. Your opponent must move that unit a number of inches equal to the prayer roll. The first model to be moved from that unit must finish the move as close as possible to the closest unit from the chanting model's army. Any remaining models in that unit must finish their move within 1" of a model from their unit that has already been moved, and as close as possible to the closest unit from the chanting model's army.
        Blood Boil If this prayer is answered, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the model chanting this prayer. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Blood Sacrifice At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the model chanting this prayer suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a KHORNE unit wholly within 8" of the model chanting this prayer. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and you receive 1 Blood Tithe point.
        Resanguination At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the model chanting this prayer suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly KHORNE HERO wholly within 16" of the model chanting this prayer and visible to them. You can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to that unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Blood Warrior 5"264+
        Bloodreaver 6"156+
        Bloodsecrator 4"593+
        Slaughterpriest 6"685+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Chaos Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Goreaxe(s).
        Chieftain 1 model in this unit can be a Chieftain. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.
        Frenzied Devotion Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE TOTEMS.
        Gorefists If an unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit that includes any models armed with a Goreaxe and Gorefist is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Hornblowers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Loathsome Sorcery Re-roll successful casting rolls for WIZARDS within 16" of this model, before any unbinding rolls are made.
        No Respite If a model from this unit is slain in the combat phase, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack wtih all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Rage of Khorne Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHORNE units while they are wholly within 16" of any models with this ability.
        Reaver Blades You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for models attacks made with Reaver Blades.
        Scorn of Sorcery This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bloodbathed Axe Melee2"34+3+-2
        Ensorcelled Axe Melee1"43+3+-11
        Goreaxe Melee1"23+4+-1
        Hackblade Melee1"33+4+-1
        Reaver Blades Melee1"14+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Khorne

        Categories: Allegiance, Allegiance: Khorne

        Battle Trait: Blood for the Blood God!, Locus of Fury, Summon Daemons of Khorne, Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning: (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne , (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, (03) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury, (05) 20 Bloodletters, (06) 15 Bloodletters, (07) 10 Flesh Hounds, (08) 3 Bloodcrushers, (09) 1 Skull Cannon, (10) 10 Bloodletters, (11) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne, (12) 5 Flesh Hounds, (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne, (14) 5 Bloodletters, (15) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood for the Blood God! You can receive rewards from the Blood Tithe Rewards Table below by using Blood Tithe points. You receive 1 Blood Tithe point each time a unit is destroyed. At the start of the hero phase, you can use 1 or more Blood Tithe points to receive 1 reward from the Blood Tithe Rewards table. Immediately carry out that reward's effect. Each reward costs a number of points as shown on the Blood Tithe Rewards table, and you can only receive a reward if you have enough Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. Note that Blood Tithe points can be spent to receive the Spelleater Curse reward at any point during the hero phase, instead of at the start of the hero phase. If you choose a reward, after resolving its effect your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero.
        Locus of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly KHORNE DAEMON units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly KHORNE DAEMON HEROES, or wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE GREATER DAEMONS.
        Summon Daemons of Khorne You can summon units of KHORNE DAEMONS to the battlefield by expending Blood Tithe points. If you have 2 or more Blood Tithe points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one unit from the list below onto the battlefield, and add it to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. If you summon a unit in this manner, your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero immediately after the unit has been set up (you cannot save any Blood Tithe points you did not use). Units summoned in this way must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly KHORNE HERO or SKULL ALTAR and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended Reward Ref
        1 Bloody Exemplar: You receive 1 command point.
        2 Spelleater Curse: Choose this reward immediately after a WIZARD has cast a spell anywhere on the battlefield, before any attempts to unbind that spell are made. That spell is not successfully cast.
        3 Murderlust: Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit; that unit can make a normal move. If it is within 12" of an enemy model, it can either make a normal move or attempt to make a charge move.
        4 Apoplectic Frenzy: Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit within 3" of an enemy unit. That KHORNE unit can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        5 Brass Skull Meteor: Pick 1 unit anywhere on the battlefield, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, roll a dice for each unit within 8" of that unit; on a 3+ the unit being rolled for suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6, the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        6 Relentless Fury: Until your next hero phase, each time a friendly KHORNE model is slain in the combat phase, before the model is removed from play, it can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        7 Crimson Rain: You can choose this reward once per battle. Immediately after you do so, and at the start of each of your subsequent hero phases, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to each friendly KHORNE unit on the battlefield.
        8 Slaughter Triumphant: You can choose this reward once per battle. After you do so, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly KHORNE unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound roll and save roll for each hit.
        Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne 16
        (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster 8
        (03) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage 8
        (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury 8
        (05) 20 Bloodletters 7
        (06) 15 Bloodletters 6
        (07) 10 Flesh Hounds 6
        (08) 3 Bloodcrushers 5
        (09) 1 Skull Cannon 5
        (10) 10 Bloodletters 4
        (11) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne 4
        (12) 5 Flesh Hounds 4
        (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne 3
        (14) 5 Bloodletters 2
        (15) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne 2

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
